extendedInfo.description: ChargePoint is the worldâs largest electric vehicle charging network.  With the ChargePoint App, EV drivers can navigate, access and charge at ANY electric vehicle charging station.  For electric vehicle drivers, using ChargePoint is the easiest, most convenient way to charge your EV.  ChargePoint gives Drivers access to thousands of public charging stations, an updated âlist viewâ to see exactly how far you are from your destination, convenient payment options, 24x7 driver support and valuable driver services.Use your ChargePoint App to:â¢ Find charging stations near you or near any specified address.â¢ Get turn-by-turn directions to charging stations.â¢ See the real-time availability of charging stations: Available or In Use.â¢ Start and stop charging sessions directly from your smart phone. (*)â¢ Get directions from your current location to where your vehicle is charging. (*)â¢ Get status on your current or most recent charging session: energy used, greenhouse gas savings, time. (*)â¢ Receive real-time notifications of your current charging session. (*)(*) Some features require a ChargePoint driver account with an activated ChargePoint card. To create an account, purchase a ChargePoint card or activate a ChargePoint card, can be done on the App itself.

reviews.title: first time user good experience
reviews.comment: only used the app twice so far. the app requires internet service to function. as a new user I don\'t have a card yet, so I used the Android app to activate the charge station, but it\'s difficult to activate charge stations that are underground due to lack of cell internet service. I had to walk outside to activate the charging session then walk back to my car to plug in. I found app easy to use to find charging locations that were not in use,check usage,balance,ect.
reviews.author: Ken Ito

reviews.title: Gets you close, let\'s you control charging.
reviews.comment: This app does\'t have enough info, nor are the locations accurate enough, and they don\'t let users correct errors.  For instance, in Monterey, CA the chargers at the Del Monte mall are not accurately located on the map, users have to view other user comments to find them, not very friendly.  Also,in Monterey at the hotel Clement chargers they don\'t tell you that you have to pay for parking, but the app only tells you that the charging is free.  Does work well to start, monitor and stop charging process.
reviews.author: Tom Ikelman

reviews.title: An EV driver\'s must have app
reviews.comment: You never have to wonder where you can charge when you are idle. User updates on station status. Ability to reserve a connection is great. And getting to park like Royalty is fun.
reviews.author: Michael Rupp

reviews.title: Can\'t start station
reviews.comment: Whenever I try to start a station, it says I need to be within one mile, even when I\'m standing next to it.
reviews.author: Chuck Homic

reviews.title: Works well but...
reviews.comment: I think it would be awesome if they would allow devices to start the charging session using NFC, should be any easy feature to add. The over-the-air start method is slow and inconsistent.
reviews.author: Marco Mascari

reviews.title: Remove the auto-location search
reviews.comment: Cannot get through to the best parts of the app until it finds your location. Should not be required. Most people do not leave gps always on to save battery life. Please make this optional.
reviews.author: Nick Reed

reviews.title: Need to fix location detection.
reviews.comment: Since the last few updates,  I have not been able to start the charge station with the app when I\'m less than 0.01 miles from the station. Keeps saying I need to be closer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Incompetent
reviews.comment: App, website, and network suck. Use evGo.
reviews.author: Bob Franklin

reviews.title: Works okay
reviews.comment: I would love it if it has an option to default to using my favorite stations as the initial view when opening up the app, or at least make it easy to get there, so no gps location is needed to view fixed stations.
reviews.author: Matt Wu

reviews.title: Works...
reviews.comment: Performance is bad, UI is worse,  and looks awful on high res devices.
reviews.author: Nick Sivo

reviews.title: Very Cool!
reviews.comment: Great Help couldn\'t live with out it in my EV
reviews.author: Pj Spez

reviews.title: Not compatible with ICS
reviews.comment: Hopefully there\'ll be an update soon
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs Improvement
reviews.comment: No way to by pass \"waiting for current location\" which happens automatically making you wait a long time before you can use the app, only to fail most of the time and searches everytime you go back to the home view.  FRUSTRATINGLY SLOW! PlugShare app works nicely.
reviews.author: Adam Eberhardt

reviews.title: Password Fail, Can\'t Create Acct
reviews.comment: Similar to many others... Razr Max HD JB
reviews.author: Gerry P

reviews.title: Accurate
reviews.comment: Suggest different color station icons which are free.
reviews.author: Mark T

reviews.title: Best app I found
reviews.comment: I was trying to find an app for charging station locator.  This app finds the charge stations and also you can sort by types and if they are free or not.  Ty for helping me find free charging spots in my area.
reviews.author: James Mello

reviews.title: Liked the older version more
reviews.comment: Current charge status harder to find than it used to be.  I was able to bring up the menu of extra items once but it doesn\'t show itself consistently.  Still the app is better than the dumbed down Blnk because the additional info is at least there (even though it is hidden by a bug and poor discoverability) and I am able to bring up.
reviews.author: Sparky Bartlett Jewell

reviews.comment: Slop right now.  When i first got it i was happy.  After the update.  Service not available 100% of the time\tBoo cakes
reviews.author: Danny Torres

reviews.comment: Cool app
reviews.author: Wayne Pane

reviews.title: Just works great
reviews.comment: Just works great
reviews.author: A Google User
